|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Android 7.1, OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 01/2018 |estprice = 35 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B078RMQYHS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"Firefly www.t-firefly.com, www.libre.computer
Libre Computer Board ROC-RK3328-CC-V1.0-A"''
is silkscreened on the board near the HDMI output. {{see also|Rockchip|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3328 @1.4GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) :64-bit ARMv8 CPU with NEON and Crypto Extensions *GPU: ''Mali-450MP2'' @500MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, eMMC module socket *Memory: 1GB (DDR4-2133) SDRAM on 32-bit bus *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 ==Links of Interest== *[https://roc-rk3328-cc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html Docs] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#ROC-RK3328-CC_(Renegade) ''Libre Computer ROC-RK3328-CC (Renegade)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/renegade-arm-computer-with-usb-3-on-android-linux ''Renegade ARM Computer with USB 3.0 on Android Linux'' on '''Indiegogo'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/12/05/libre-computer-renegade-sbc-features-rockchip-rk3328-processor-with-up-to-4gb-ddr4-ram-crowdfunding/ ''Libre Computer Renegade SBC Features Rockchip RK3328'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=libre-computer-renegade ''ROC-RK3328-CC: A Raspberry Pi competitor with Gigabit Ethernet'' on '''Phoronix''' ]
